thread.title: The Best Tweets of the 2017 Oscars
thread.title_full: The Best Tweets of the 2017 Oscars

title: The Best Tweets of the 2017 Oscars
text: The Best Tweets of the 2017 Oscars So Far February 27, 2017 12:49 AM by Madeleine Luckel Photo: Getty Images What are the best Oscars 2017 tweets so far? While the 89th Academy Awards do not air on the East Coast until 8:30 PM, nominees, presenters, and guests alike are currently making their way down the red carpet . Yes, you may not see Lin-Manuel Miranda or Jimmy Kimmel clutching their iPhones as they make their way towards the Kodak Theater, but have no doubt that these social media-savvy attendees will be tweeting throughout the night. Miranda, for his part, shared the fact that his mother, who is his date for the evening , was watching Gilmore Girls on their way over. Ellen DeGeneres wished Jimmy Kimmel good luck, while not-so-subtly reminding the host about his 40 million expected viewers. And for his own part, Kimmel has been off to a multiple tweet kind of night. However, it's not only attendees who are sharing their quick takes on the night. Below, the best Oscars 2017 tweets so far. But between the photo-bomb trend currently cropping up left and right on the red carpet (we saw you, Justin Timberlake), and the fact that the show itself has yet to begin, weâ€™re sure that there will be plenty more to come. #Oscars2017, we'll be watching.
